alert.note: Alert for Southern Nassau (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk and eastern Nassau Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Melville, or over Deer Park, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Levittown, Commack, Huntington Station, Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Plainview, Massapequa, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Syosset, Huntington, Babylon and Patchogue. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
